abstract: Citigroup’s hiring of an energy banker, Stephen Trauber — even for a reported $30 million package — could pay off in the end because he is considered one of the most active deal makers in Houston.
snippet: Citigroup’s hiring of an energy banker, Stephen Trauber — even for a reported $30 million package — could pay off in the end because he is considered one of the most active deal makers in Houston.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup’s hiring of Stephen Trauber and his team of energy bankers from UBS was seen as a victory for the bank when it was announced earlier this month.

headline.main: What a Top Energy Banker Brings to Citigroup
